# GitHub Folder Instructions

These are sample instructions located in the .github directory.

## Coding Standards

- Instructions can be in multiple locations
- Test directory resolution
- Verify file discovery mechanisms

## Guidelines

1. Support multiple folder locations
2. Enable flexible organization
3. Maintain consistency across locations

## Best Practices

- Document folder structure
- Test discovery mechanisms
- Provide clear examples
